function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragmentation of health services leading to limited timely interventions and responses to health crises","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Establishing a strong coordination mechanism among health services and departments, improving communication and data sharing","Technologies":"Health information systems, digital health platforms for data sharing","People":"Public and community members, healthcare workers, government health departments","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of highly active surveillance using WHO-recommended surveillance case definition","Impact":"Delayed detection and response to outbreaks, ineffective containment of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing WHO-recommended surveillance case definition, strengthening surveillance and reporting systems, training healthcare workers","Technologies":"Data analytics, disease surveillance software, mobile health applications","People":"Healthcare workers, public health organizations, government health departments","Owner":"Public health organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Lack of supported physical distancing interventions leading to high epidemic peaks","Impact":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, overwhelming healthcare systems, increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Implementing non-pharmaceutical interventions, promoting physical distancing measures, public health education and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring systems","People":"Public and community members, healthcare workers, government health departments","Owner":"Government health departments, public health organizations"}]}
